title.value: Cambia Health Foundation 2023 Sojourns Scholar Leadership Program - CFA

body.value:
Cambia Health Foundation has opened the 2023 Sojourns Scholar Leadership Program call for applications, which will be the tenth and final cohort within the original program commitment of investing in up to 12 scholars per year for 10 years.

As part of the leadership development program, each Sojourns Scholar receives $180,000 in funding ($90,000/year over a two-year period) to conduct an innovative and impactful clinical, policy, education, or systems change project in the field of palliative care.

Each Scholar also receives individual mentorship and support to implement a leadership development plan designed to support their growth as a national leader. Emerging palliative care leaders throughout the country, across all disciplines and practice settings are encouraged to apply.

Letter of Intent (LOI) due by Feb. 27, 2023 @ 12pm PT

Full Proposal Grant Applications due by June 5, 2023 at 12pm PT

If invited for an interview, applicant must be available to attend a virtual interview that will be scheduled on Sept. 19 and 20, 2023.

For more information click HERE.

Questions? Please contact Jennifer Fuller, Program Officer at Jennifer.Fuller@cambiahealth.com or Emily Rogers, Program Specialist at Emily.Rogers@cambiahealth.com

field_subtitle.value: Cambia Health Foundation 2023 Sojourns Scholar Leadership Program - Call for Applications (10th and final cohort)
